name: Branch Puzzle: Connect Them!
description:
All facets of life rely on continuous connections to function properly; the orbit of our planet, the rivers it contains, the relationships of its people... and so it is true with earth's wooden branches.
Restore the branch pieces to their natural connections, and they will knit together! Knit enough branches to restore the life force within and inspire blossoms and berries to sprout!

• Two game modes.
• Every puzzle is unique, no repetitions.
• Post your scores to Google Play leaderboard to become world champion!
• Easy to use.
• Great graphics and animations.
• Android Wear support - you can play the game on your smartwatch.

This free game is also known as Plumber or Netwalk.
